title: LF low elo ranked team with voice com.
body:
I'm a silver 5 top lane Riven main who was recently abandoned by my old team and was wanting to make a few new friends and get info ranked next season.
While I main Riven, I am also quite fluent on Yasuo, Rengar, Jayce, Diana, Fiora and a few other champions. I can play any role except bot to a pretty decent standard for my elo and would love to learn some new champions and even bot lane roles from those more comfortable on them.
Feel free to add me on league or drop your user name here if you'd like to chat and thank you for taking the time to read this.

replies.body:
Hey PyreWolf,
I'm making a new clan/team called Tengu Force Gaming and we've been looking for a mid laner and I think you might be the one we've been looking for but it would make it 10x easier if you were from Melbourne or Sydney.

and yes, ihave a good headset and a really good pc and skype/teamspeak :3 am happy to get any other coms system though :D
I wouldn't mind playing with someone new(as long as you're not salty).I'm a jungle main (mid main before) and wouldn't mind learning a thing or two from you.

Hey bro, I only started this year and joined ranked before i was ready for it so I'm bronze 5. Have been maining mid recently but I am also improving jungler as well. I am about to finish uni and have the whole summer pretty free :)
Mid: annie, agri, lb, veigar.
adc: ashe, trist
jung: kindred, learning: reksai, rammus and elise
Happy to get any voice com thats needed
